hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "###### DEPLOY :: BEGIN" echo "#### SET VARIABLES" BLUE_APP_NAME=$APP_NAME GREEN_APP_NAME="${BLUE_APP_NAME}-GREEN"
echo "#### CHANGE WORKSPACE" cd $WORKSPACE
echo "#### EXECUTE CF LOGIN" cf login --skip-ssl-validation -a @CF_API_URL -u @CF_ACCOUNT_ID -p @CF_ACCOUNT_PASSWORD -o $ORG_NAME -s $SPACE_NAME
if [ $DEPLOY_TYPE = "DEV" ]; then echo "#### DEV DEPLOY :: BEGIN" echo "## DEV DEPLOY :: GET BUILD FILE" wget $BUILD_FILE_PATH -O $BUILD_FILE_NAME -q
echo "## DEV DEPLOY :: CF PUSH" cf push $APP_NAME -b $BUILD_PACK_NAME -p ./$BUILD_FILE_NAME
echo "## DEV DEPLOY :: DELETE BUILD FILE" rm -rf ./$BUILD_FILE_NAME echo "#### DEV DEPLOY :: END" fi
if [ $DEPLOY_TYPE = "BLUE_DEPLOY" ]; then echo "#### BLUE DEPLOY :: BEGIN" echo "## BLUE DEPLOY :: MAP ROUTE" cf map-route $GREEN_APP_NAME @DOMAIN_NAME -n $BLUE_APP_NAME
echo "## BLUE DEPLOY :: DELETE BLUE APP" cf delete $BLUE_APP_NAME -f
echo "## BLUE DEPLOY :: RENAME GREEN APP TO BLUE APP" cf rename $GREEN_APP_NAME $BLUE_APP_NAME
echo "## BLUE DEPLOY :: DELETE GREEN APP ROUTE" cf delete-route @DOMAIN_NAME -n $GREEN_APP_NAME -f echo "#### BLUE DEPLOY :: END" fi
if [ $DEPLOY_TYPE = "GREEN_DEPLOY" ]; then echo "#### GREEN DEPLOY :: BEGIN" echo "## GREEN DEPLOY :: GET BUILD FILE" wget $BUILD_FILE_PATH -O $BUILD_FILE_NAME -q
echo "## GREEN DEPLOY :: CF PUSH" cf push $GREEN_APP_NAME -b $BUILD_PACK_NAME -p ./$BUILD_FILE_NAME
echo "## GREEN DEPLOY :: DELETE BUILD FILE" rm -rf ./$BUILD_FILE_NAME echo "#### GREEN DEPLOY :: END" fi
if [ $DEPLOY_TYPE = "REVERT_GREEN_DEPLOY" ]; then echo "## REVERT GREEN DEPLOY :: DELETE GREEN APP" cf delete $GREEN_APP_NAME -f
echo "## REVERT GREEN DEPLOY :: DELETE GREEN APP ROUTE" cf delete-route @DOMAIN_NAME -n $GREEN_APP_NAME -f fi
echo "###### DEPLOY :: END"
